meanings.definition: A marine animal with a jelly-like umbrella-shaped body and stinging tentacles.
meanings.sent1: Jellyfishes swim gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I saw a school of jellyfishes while snorkeling.
meanings.sent3: The jellyfishes had a party under the sea.
meanings.sent4: Her dress flowed like a school of jellyfishes.
meanings.sent5: The aquarium exhibit showcased colorful jellyfishes.

meanings.sent1: Look at all the jellyfishes in the tank!
meanings.sent2: The beach was filled with jellyfishes washed ashore.
meanings.sent3: The jellyfishes gathered for a meeting in the sea.
meanings.sent4: The sky was dotted with clouds like jellyfishes.
meanings.sent5: The market sold various types of jellyfishes.
